text: Noah James Shebib (born March 31, 1983), better known as 40, is a Canadian hip hop record producer. He is the main producer for all of Canadian rapper Drake's singles. In 2005, Shebib was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. His mother would also be diagnosed with the disease two years after. == Grammy Awards == His works were nominated for Grammy Awards sixteen times. He won twice. In 2013, Take Care received a Best Rap Album award. In 2019, "God's Plan" won 3 awards: Record of the Year, Song of the Year, Best Rap Song. == References == == Other websites == * Instagram Page * Twitter Page Category:1983 births Category:Canadian record producers Category:Hip hop record producers Category:R&B; musicians Category:Musicians from Toronto Category:Living people Category:Canadian child actors Category:Canadian composers Category:Canadian Grammy Award winners Category:People with multiple sclerosis Category:Pseudonyms
title: 40 (record producer)
